text: The Endless Summer Tour was the third headlining concert tour by American singer-songwriter Lana Del Rey in support of her third studio album, Ultraviolence (2014). Del Rey conducted a run of gigs in April and May 2014 in North America before Ultraviolence (2014) was released. Among these several performances were two at the Coachella Valley Music and Arts Festival, when Del Rey debuted "West Coast," the lead song from Ultraviolence. Del Rey performed at a number of music festivals in Europe in June, July, and August 2014 following the release of Ultraviolence. However, she had to postpone the remaining promotional shows because of health concerns. Category:Lana Del Rey concert tours
title: The Endless Summer Tour
